subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: Mark Foster and Richard Finch of England shared a one-shot lead at the midway point of the Johnnie Walker Championship at Gleneagles, Scotland, at eight-under-par 136.
snippet: Mark Foster and Richard Finch of England shared a one-shot lead at the midway point of the Johnnie Walker Championship at Gleneagles, Scotland, at eight-under-par 136.
